overview: (Set This) World Ablaze is the first live album by American metalcore band Killswitch Engage. The DVD is of a live show that was taped at The Palladium in Worcester, Massachusetts on July 25, 2005. Includes "From The Bedroom To The Basement" â€“ an 85 minute documentary on the rise of the band.
title: Killswitch Engage: (Set This) World Ablaze
